mapper.select: select m.id as modelId, m.org_identity_id as identityId, m.name as fileName, m.meta_data_id as metaDataId, m.meta_data_id as meta, m.file_path as filePath, if('en' = #{language, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a.algorithm_name_en, a.algorithm_name) as algorithmName FROM t_model m INNER JOIN t_algorithm a ON m.train_algorithm_id = a.id where m.train_user_address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.supported_algorithm_id = #{algorithmId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and m.org_identity_id = #{identityId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
